mainHero.title: Meet Hera, Your
mainHero.subtitle: Personal Nutrition Assistant
mainHero.description: Unleash the power of AI for your nutrition goals with Hera, your personal nutrition assistant. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, gain muscle, or simply strive for a balanced diet, Hera is here to support you on your journey towards a healthier lifestyle.

items.title: Personalized Nutritional Insights
items.description: Through a deep understanding of the food you consume, Hera can analyze the macro-nutrients, micro-nutrients, and calories in your meals. It's as easy as telling Hera what you've been eating, and you'll receive instant nutritional analysis

items.title: Transform Your Diet with Hera
items.description: With Hera, making informed food choices is a breeze. By tracking your nutrition, Hera helps you understand the impact of your diet on your health, enabling you to make changes that suit your personal needs and goals.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
